detail_desc: Flannel shirt in a soft cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and a rounded hem. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Cut-off, frayed edges at the cuffs and hem.
Checked shirt in soft cotton flannel in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ripped-off sleeves. Collar, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Checked shirt in soft cotton flannel in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ripped-off sleeves. Collar, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

All-in-one pyjamas in organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar, chest pocket and press-studs down the front, at the crotch and down the insides of the legs.
All-in-one pyjamas in organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar, chest pocket and press-studs down the front, at the crotch and down the insides of the legs.

Gently flared tulle skirt with a gathered, elasticated waist. Lined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Double elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem. Medium support.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Double elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem. Medium support.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Double elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem. Medium support.

Long dress in chiffon with a lace bodice. Wide neckline, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a decorative grosgrain band and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Fully lined with support panels at the top.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with lace at the top, a boat neck, short cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with a pleated skirt. Satin lining at the top with side support and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Straight-cut blouse in a textured weave with short puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back of the neck.
Satin blouse with a grandad collar, concealed buttons down the front, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Long sleeves with wide cuffs with covered buttons.

Body in microfibre and lace with a gentle shaping effect on the tummy, seat and back. V-neck with transparent lace sections at the sides, adjustable shoulder straps and glued edges for a smoother silhouette. String back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Oversized jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with an embroidered motif on the chest and a round neckline. Buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening, jetted back pockets, tapered legs with sewn-in creases and short slits at the hems.
Long jumpsuit in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening with a button at the back of the neck, short, wide sleeves, a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide, elasticated smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide, elasticated smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide, elasticated smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs.
Short halterneck dress in chiffon with a shimmering pattern. Opening at the front, a hook-and-eye fastening and ties at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, classic front and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
